question: 待ちぼうけ
sourceMnemonic: With <vocabulary>待ち</vocabulary> you know you're waiting, but what's a <vocabulary>ぼうけ</vocabulary>? Turns out it's the long version of <ja>ボケ</ja> which means idiot. Basically, in this case you're a waiting idiot. Why? because you were <vocabulary>stood up</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>待ち</ja> comes right from <ja>待つ</ja>. You know the drill by now.
